@graph.name: Homemade Lemonade Recipe
@graph.description: A simple and refreshing homemade lemonade recipe! You only need sugar, water, and lemons to make this classic drink recipe. Check out the step-by-step video just below the recipe! This recipe makes 1/2 gallon of lemonade but can successfully be doubled!

video.name: How to Make Homemade Lemonade
video.description:
A simple and refreshing homemade lemonade recipe!

↓↓↓↓↓CLICK FOR MORE↓↓↓↓↓↓

You only need sugar, water, and lemons to make this classic drink recipe.

Full Printable Recipe: https://sugarspunrun.com/homemade-lemonade-recipe/

Measuring Cup (Affiliate Link): https://amzn.to/2NLiLpy

Ingredients

6 cups water divided (1.4liter)
1 cup granulated sugar (200g)
1 cup fresh-squeezed lemon juice¹ seeds removed, pulp may remain (236ml)
 
Instructions
Combine 1 cup (236ml) water and 1 cup sugar in a small saucepan. Place over medium-low heat and stir until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and set aside, allow to cool for 10 minutes.
Pour 1 cup fresh-squeezed lemon juice into a pitcher. Add sugar/water mixture (simple syrup).
Add remaining 5 cups (1420ml) water and stir well. Pour over ice and serve, or transfer to refrigerator and allow to chill several hours before serving.
Notes
¹I really recommend fresh squeezed, but my brother often makes this recipe using bottled lemon juice with success.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Sugarspunrun/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sugarspun_sam/

DISCLAIMER: This video description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I’ll receive a small commission. This help support the channel and allows us to continue to make videos like this. Thank you for the support!
